mapper.select: select c.div_name, a.*, b.item_bid_code, b.supplier_credit_code, b.first_bid_unit_rate, b.end_bid_unit_rate, b.remark from sub_div_work_bill a left join supplier_bid_item_rate b on a.division_sn_code = b.division_sn_code and b.supplier_credit_code = #{supplierCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} join eng_division c on a.division_sn_code = c.division_sn_code where a.tender_plan_code = #{tenderPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.*, b.item_bid_code, b.supplier_credit_code, b.first_bid_unit_rate, b.end_bid_unit_rate, b.remark from ( select supplier_credit_code,tender_plan_code from ( select tender_plan_code, SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(supplier_credit_code order by if(isnull(order_by),99999,order_by), first_quote), ',', 1 ) supplier_credit_code from bid_supplier a where exists ( select 1 from bid_evaluation_report b where status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.tender_plan_code = b.tender_plan_code ) group BY tender_plan_code ) e ) f join sub_div_work_bill a on f.tender_plan_code = a.tender_plan_code join supplier_bid_item_rate b on a.division_sn_code = b.division_sn_code and b.supplier_credit_code = f.supplier_credit_code and a.division_sn_code in ( select division_sn_code from sub_div_work_tender_result_change_bill a where a.change_code = #{changeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.change_type = 3 union all select division_sn_code from sub_div_work_tender_result_change_bill a join tender_result_change b on a.change_code = b.tender_result_id_change_code where b.status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.change_supplier = #{changeSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select a.division_sn_code, b.item_bid_code, b.supplier_credit_code, b.first_bid_unit_rate, b.end_bid_unit_rate, b.remark from sub_div_work_bill a left join supplier_bid_item_rate b on a.division_sn_code = b.division_sn_code where a.tender_plan_code = #{tenderPlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into supplier_bid_item_rate (item_bid_code, division_sn_code, supplier_credit_code, first_bid_unit_rate, end_bid_unit_rate, remark) values (#{itemBidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divisionSnCode.divisionSnCode.divisionSnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstBidUnitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{endBidUnitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into supplier_bid_item_rate
item_bid_code,
division_sn_code,
supplier_credit_code,
first_bid_unit_rate,
end_bid_unit_rate,
remark,
#{itemBidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{divisionSnCode.divisionSnCode.divisionSnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{firstBidUnitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{endBidUnitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update supplier_bid_item_rate
division_sn_code = #{divisionSnCode.divisionSnCode.divisionSnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_credit_code = #{supplierCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_bid_unit_rate = #{firstBidUnitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
end_bid_unit_rate = #{endBidUnitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where item_bid_code = #{itemBidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update supplier_bid_item_rate set division_sn_code = #{divisionSnCode.divisionSnCode.divisionSnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_credit_code = #{supplierCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_bid_unit_rate = #{firstBidUnitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, end_bid_unit_rate = #{endBidUnitRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where item_bid_code = #{itemBidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
